xmlText.p: First Period_1, Philadelphia, Konecny 14 (Gostisbehere, Giroux), 1:54. Penalties_New Jersey bench, served by Wood (too many men on the ice), 4:34; Simmonds, PHI, (high sticking), 10:11; Noesen, NJ, (interference), 12:49; Couturier, PHI, (tripping), 13:31.
